S.FORM: Pierre Nkurunziza 12 bulad 18 demiad, Pierre Nkurunziza, u misingkiway. 1963 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Burundi ayza sa ci Pierre Nkurunziza, micakat a demiad sa i 2005 a mihca 4 bulad 26 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
